name: Royal Epic
description:
Head on or in the back, all your enemies have got their eyes on you and try to crush you.
Rebels strike, conquest stages, and the army of the undead threatens to battle the realm in this Simulation and RPG hybrid. Start from a lord, we provide multiple ways for you to power up, and your ultimate goal is to rule whole Realm.

'Winter is coming. From polar night, I come.' ——The Night Lord

KEY FEATURES
-Ramble in Kingdoms to increase intimacy with beauties.
-Initiate romantic liaisons to propagate your authority and bloodline.
-Recruit loyal, competent vassals and lead them into battle against enemies.
-Interact with global players, including forging Alliances and commercing.
-Master your elite troops to win PvP battles.
-Stabilize domestic affairs of your state.
-Worship the Throne until you claim the Crown.

We trust your guidance and wisdom will surely unify kingdoms, eradicate the Undead, and usher forth a new era of prestige. For the glory of the kingdom!

Follow and like us on Facebook to get the latest news of Lords Game.
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RoyalEpicEN/
If you have any feedback or suggestions, please feel free to contact us!
E-mail: support_royalepic@gogogame.com
